panels.description: Time taken by "serialization", "deserialization" & business logic of amplitude connector transforms per record.
panels.title: Transform timers breakup

panels.description: Total Time taken by amplitude connector transforms per record.
panels.title: Transform timers breakup

panels.description:
API Flush Time : Time taken taken by amplitude connector to send a batch of records via the Amplitude API. 
Batch Send Time : Time taken taken by amplitude connector to process & send a batch of records via the Amplitude API.
panels.title: API Flush Time vs Batch Send Time

panels.description:
API Flush Size : Number of records sent by amplitude connector in a batch to Amplitude API.
 
Batch Size : Number of records available post sampling to be sent by amplitude connector after a single poll call from a Kafka partition.
panels.title: API Flush Size vs Batch Size
